Enderman Experience Farm.Location: Through the End Portal, off the main island
Enderman Experience Farm.Notes: After entering the End, take the downward steps and eventually you will hit the farm. Just hit the endermen with your sword.

Overworld Mob Farm.Notes: Take the soul sand elevator to the AFK spot on top. Once you are done, sorted output is on the roof of the farm.

Sugar Cane Farm.Notes: Take the soul sand elevator, and hold forward to get off at the first stop. Output is behind the mob farm sorter.

Iron Golem Farm.Notes: Output in a chest at the bottom of the farm.
